ygData.subject: Anyone else make money like this?
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you not on top of things, with Verants forecasted (test server)change of price for pie sketches(pottery), players just loaded up their inventorys
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you not on top of things, with Verants forecasted (test
server)change of price for pie sketches(pottery), players just loaded up
their inventorys with pie sketches at 12 copper each.
Well after the patch, npc's will now buy those pie sketches for about 500
copper.
I know of numerous players that filled up their inventories, their bank, and
mules with these stackable pie sketches.
Total possible, 2880 sketches, for one character.
Total Investment: 12 copper * 2880 = 34,560 copper
Total ROI: 500 copper * 2880 = 1,440,000 copper.
thats a 35pp investment with a return of 1,440pp
Pottery was very profitable. For some.

Good hump-day to you all!

Demur
